changesets.comments: renderer: don't print the extension string per default fixes #556

journals.notes: I see your point but I don't think the gfx card info is completely useless. The GL_EXTENSION info is important to know when users have gfx issues with special settings. If that isn't shown useres can't report it and our job to nail it down is a bit more difficult.

IR4T4 wrote:
> I see your point but I don't think the gfx card info is completely useless. The GL_EXTENSION info is important to know when users have gfx issues with special settings. If that isn't shown useres can't report it and our job to nail it down is a bit more difficult.

Actually we should modify it so that it only gets printed if there is an issue (or with a startup cvar)..
cvar r_gfxInfo has been added. Well if users have issues it might be a visible issue only. At great sacrifice this feature request is completed and the spammy extension string print is history.

subject: Clean up console
description:
There's stuff in the game console which is completely useless for average player, how about hiding it?

Example:
R_Init output which spams the console every map reload (see shot0001.jpg)

I think "ET Gold":http://forums.warchest.com/showthread.php/24891-ETGold-2-71 did it best (see etgold.jpg)
